Package com.pranavpandey.android.dynamic.support.theme.fragment

Class ThemeFragment<T extends DynamicAppTheme>

  • java.lang.Object
    • androidx.fragment.app.Fragment
      • com.pranavpandey.android.dynamic.support.fragment.DynamicFragment
        • com.pranavpandey.android.dynamic.support.theme.fragment.ThemeFragment<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ComponentCallbacks, SharedPreferences.OnSharedPreferenceChangeListener, View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, androidx.lifecycle.HasDefaultViewModelProviderFactory, androidx.lifecycle.LifecycleOwner, androidx.lifecycle.ViewModelStoreOwner, androidx.savedstate.SavedStateRegistryOwner, DynamicLifecycle, DynamicSearchListener, DynamicTransitionListener, ThemeListener<T>, ThemeListener.Export<T>, ThemeListener.Import<T>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DynamicRemoteThemeFragment, DynamicThemeFragment
    public abstract class ThemeFragment<T extends DynamicAppTheme>
extends DynamicFragment
implements ThemeListener.Import<T>, ThemeListener.Export<T>
    Base theme fragment to provide theme editing functionality.

    Extend this fragment to implement theme attributes according to the need.
